case.state: I am Zenobia, the sandbox witch. You are foolish to challenge me.
Grahh! I can't eat you. And if you're not good as a meal, then why the hell are you even here?
You're about as edible as a pile of rocks, Bi. I may be some human eating monster, but there's some humans too disgusting for even me to eat.
You look tasty, but you smell weird. Less like flesh, and more like... stuffing?
Ooooh, we've got a badass here. You think you're so tough, don't you.
What are you? You're too disgusting to even be a witch.
And you're actively making it uglier.
A mime! Awesome. Now you won't make a sound as I devour you.
Pertect. I always have trouble getting all the bloodstains clean in my labyrinth.
Very special. Be a dear and get some garlic out would you.
What, did the giant bucket not clue you in?
EVIL! EEEEEEEEEVIL! And I should know evil, because I am evil.
Oooh. Perfect. A refreshing drink to go with my dinner.
Are you even edible?
A magical girl? Ohoho. This will be fun. Magical girls always taste the best.
Another visitor! Stay a while! Stay FOREVER!
Oh goodie! Mashed ~name~ for the main course!
I spy with my eye, someone who must die.
What the? You might just be an even uglier beast than me.
Oh my... Someone who fancies themselves to be strong. There's nothing like breaking someone's spirit before I eat them.
You're so normal that it's almost scary. Your flesh probably tastes like nothing.
I smell something fishy.. and it's not just that pool float witch's familiars.
How am I supposed to feed my familiars a stuffed toy? They need nourishment. Human meat.
You're comparing yourself to me? Let's just hope that umbrella can survive a mountain of sand.
A sentient car? You better not try to run me over.
You're such an idiot. It's not fun eating people if they can't feel pain.
Yes, you may take a nap. Inside my belly that is.
If you're a thief, you're a loser. And you don't want to be a loser. They don't have any fun.
I won't just settle for a bite. I'm going for a full course meal. And you're all invited.
A Magical Girl?!?! We shall battle on different terms. You don't have a choice in this matter!
I shall enjoy devouring you all!
Destroy them, my familiars!
~cards~ cards will do.
Familiar, fetch me ~cards~ new cards.
This is easier than taking candy from a baby... and then eating the baby.
Who knew that abandoning my humanity would make me so powerful?
I knew from the start that I would win.
Humans don't stand a change against me.
I may be hideous, but after a year of torture, you will beg to be my dinner.
Your continued resistance annoys me.
I could still win, as I should, because I'm superior to a human.
Who are you to give me an awful hand?
Humans, do you honestly think you can beat me?
Which one of you should I eat first?
Don't you all love sand? I know it's rough, coarse, and gets everywhere, but I can say the same about you lousy humans.
Grrr! Why do you continue to resist?
Oh sure, give the witch the awful hand...
Even with this horrid hand, I shall still prevail.
It's almost like I'm a pathetic monster who deserves to lose with a hand like this
Ugh. Remind me to cut your vile throats once the game is over.
It doesn't look like you have any sand tires.
You really are the dumbest person I ever met. This is brilliant.
But that can wait. For now, I will humor you and your silly game.
A minor setback.
So what if I strip? I'm still unstoppable!
I'll humor you. I'll strip.
How annoying!
Must I bare my perfect body for you all? I'd prefer to just eat you.
I'd sooner die than lose!
A perfect lifeform such as myself shouldn't need to strip. But if you insist...
Annoying pests.
I shall humor you and your game. I am the epitome of beauty, after all. I can go without my shovels.
I'm literal perfection. Surely a little eye candy won't hurt.
Grrr.
I'll crush you for this.
I shall not lose again.
Now, shall we get on to the next round? I'm getting hungry after all.
Where are my familiars when I need them?
Familiars? Where are you? I need you to bake these idiots into bread.
You're making this too easy for me.
Poor, pitiful ~name~. They can't beat me.
You are merely a bacteria in comparison to me.
And I didn't sign up to have my dinner be a whiny brat.
Ohoho! You keep telling yourself that, Sayaka.
Are we going to see your crotch now as well?
Quit crying and face your annihilation. You will never defeat me.
Ohoho! I'm so excited to see you squirm. Ready to get naked for us, you fool?
Humanity is overrated! Witches are where it's at!
Drown in the heart-lorn world of nothingness!
Witches have abandoned clothing long ago... I suggest you do so too, ~name~.
The forces of the universe bend to me!
I must ask, why suction cups? They won't help you with a witch.
You're barely even an appetizer, but you'll have to do I guess.
I've met other badasses before. They thought they could kill me. They're all in my belly now.
Don't worry, I'm an equal opportunity carnivore. I'll eat you regardless of your sexuality.
I should turn you into a dog and see how you like it.
Pathetic coward. Know that Magical girls aren't here to protect you.
Did your mommy make that for you or something?
I can't wait to see you naked... You'll taste better that way.
You probably need a sword, or a machine gun. Not suction cups.
You'll at least be a nice little snack to tide me over until my next big meal.
Come on! BRING IT ON!
Take something off next time, or else!
You prolong the inevitable.
You don't have infinite clothing... But I do... I just don't need it.
I would have been happy to tear them off of you, but this works for me.
Pitiful girl! Know your place!
I sense your embarrassment. It makes me happy.
Useless girl can't even strip right.
Clothing tastes awful, I always strip it off of my meals.
Your memory's not so good these days, but these sands don't forget!
I will end you!
You are ignorant as to the rules of this world. I will teach you that you are merely my food.
Just a small morsel before the main course, not my concern.
You still don't get it do you? I am better than you.
I never liked the taste of clothing anyway.
Your ~clothing~ won't help you!
Oh, believe me, I know. I've been through this all before.
Oh yes, Mitakihara truly is such a wonderful city.
They can't all be winners.
I'm the bestest girl there ever was, ~name~.
We shall see your true form soon enough.
My grief seed is way better than your soul gem. Superior even. A direct upgrade, perhaps.
You keep telling yourself that. If I don't defeat you, then perhaps they will.
Ohoho, is that another witch's kiss?
Such a wonderful buffet of humans for me to devour.
But your next one had better be a winner!
It's almost funny thinking you can beat me with that.
You really don't want to bore a witch. I might just skip the game and gobble you up right here and now.
I wouldn't have it any other way.
You might actually make me horny for once!
Don't get your hopes up. You'll still lose.
I'd never imagine why you wouldn't take that off first, ~name~.
You silly humans and your silly clothing. I don't know why you wear that in the first place.
We can always do better. Like showing your genitals to me, ~name~.
RUN, COWARD! BEWARE, I LIVE!
Come on, stop delaying. I demand that you present your plump behind to me.
Yeah, take off that silly cape. Stop pretending to be a hero.
At least you aren't a magical girl.
Regular humans cannot hope to beat me.
I'm the prettiest witch there ever was, but you ain't the prettiest human there ever was.
I saw that coming from a mile away. Witches can read emotions, you know, and I could read that you were hiding something.
Oh well. I'll get to see it eventually, whether by your hand or by ripping your panties off of your dismembered corpse.
You're no hero. You're just an idiot. You'll never save everyone.
If you were a magical girl, I'd have killed you on sight.
Human beings really are ugly.
Ohoho, I like your body, ~name~. I almost don't want to eat you.
A hat, why a hat?
Look at this body, Freddy. You can only get this with a magical girl contract.
Oooh, if I were still human, than I might be interested in that.
Time to see your wonderful chest.
We're almost done here. That almost makes me sad.
I'd shove that hat up your ass... but you don't have an ass, do you?
Kyubey would never work with you though. You're already disgusting. I can't imagine seeing you as a witch.
But I'm not, so I can't, and that's a shame. Still gonna have fun eating you, though.
Men really are so boring. But Magical Girls are so even worse. You better not be a Magical Girl's boyfriend...
How many useless men are out there? Would anyone miss you?
You tell me, you stupid doll!
Now you're finally done wasting my time.
The difficult part is over with... I wanted to watch you struggle for longer.
Hahahahaha! Utterly pathetic! You're not even worthy of being familiar food.
I don't have anything to say about that. It's just lame.
Now we can get to the fun stuff right away. Fun for me that is.
What are you expecting me to say about it? That I like it? I'm a horrid sand witch, give me a break!
That looks like a tool worthy of my attention.
You'll be a miserable little pile of stuffing once I'm done with you.
I didn't even know humans were capable of being that big.
Did another witch give you that? I don't think a thing like that is possible.
Perhaps you'd be interested in making love with me? I promise not to bite your head off afterwards.
I'm sure everyone's more interested in my breasts than they are in yours, darling.
No matter what your breasts look like, they aren't as beautiful as mine.
My familiars love the taste of human breast milk, I'll have you know.
Your flat body is so boring. Real girls should have impossible curves.
A flat magical girl once entered my barrier, trying to kill me. I used her bones to build a sandcastle.
Flat magical girls are always the most insecure. I don't get it myself.
I love seeing you embarrassed like this, Sayaka. How on earth can you fight me if you're covering yourself with your other hand?
You could make a man happy with that. Preferably far away from here. Human mating is disgusting.
Against a normal girl, those might work, but I am not a normal girl, as you can very clearly see.
Ohoho, trying to compete with me, are you? I am not constrained by human anatomy, so mine are obviously better.
You might have the breasts, but do you have the sand manipulation powers?
As I thought. Totally pathetic.
Huh. I expected to be more excited to see you naked. Strange.
The good thing about becoming a witch is that I've stopped caring about things like nudity.
The human form is so obsolete and ugly. True beauty can only be found with the power of darkness.
But your butt... It makes me feel happy. You look positively scrumptuous.
If you were a witch, than this would be a lot easier for you.
You humans all look the same.
Don't try and compare yourself to me! You'll always lose.
You had better enjoy it.
Human... you're useless, irrelevant, and pitiful.
Oh my...
This requires my attention.
There's nothing like seeing a pitiful human get what's coming to them.
Keep that up, and I just might not eat you.
I had a boyfriend back when I was still human, I wonder what happened to him? Oh right, I killed him and turn his skin into a rug.
I'm sure you can't resist playing with yourself when I'm around.
Am I not the epitome of beauty?
You're free to masturbate to my perfect body if you want.
You're finally done?
I am your destiny, and my belly is your destination.
What the? Your body is collapsing in on itself, just like my barrier will when I die, which I never will.
Perhaps you could play with that umbrella of yours?
If only I could get those pitiful magical girls to do this for me!
Your pitiful attempts at opposition have angered me!
The only thing that could make this more perfect is if you were covered in olive oil. You'd fry real good covered in oil.
Now I won't get to eat you. Such a shame.
Or you could just warp away and leave me hungry, that's fine too!
Then they'd know their place in the world, food for me and my familiars!
That was the last card game you'll ever play, and you lost to me.
Whatever that power is, I must destroy it. That spiral witch cannot steal all my food.
And stop floating around! I can snap you like a twig, I'll have you know.
I'm not actually aroused by it, but I like it regardless.
Are you not having fun with this?
Are you lost? Frightened? Confused? Good! Muahahahaha!
I'm having so much fun watching you squirm.
I almost wish I could actually get pleasure from that.
I hope you had fun, ~name~. Because it'll be time for me to eat you soon.
And with that, your death is assured, ~name~.
Me! Lose first! Unbelievable!
Enough of this! I've nothing more to remove, so I'll simply get back to my craft.
Get in the way of my craft, and I will not hesitate to kill you.
It must be perfect!
It still looks wrong!
My sandcastle shall be the greatest one ever created.
I can still fix this!
There we go. That's better.
Gotta take out my anger and work on my castle. I work better when I'm angry.
Almost there.
Just one little adjustment here.
I think I'm almost done.
Perfect!
I'm not very hungry now, for some reason.
Finally, the perfect castle. I've waited years for this moment.
I bet you could never make a castle as beautiful as this one!
Why do I feel strangely empty about my creation? It's perfect, isn't it?
I'm too happy to want to eat you now... My castle is literally perfect now.
Hooray. Now I get to eat you all!
The game's over? Awesome! I'm really starting to get hungry.
Tell no one of what you've seen. Especially not any Magical Girls.
You gave me the perfect castle. How can I kill you now?
